728842f-a.title: Richmond: Forest Avenue - Elizabeth Road
728842f-a.text:
Forest Avenue (formerly Washington Avenue), west
from about Elizabeth Grove Road. The sign by the roadside reads:
What the Brooklyn Bridge has done for Brooklyn, what the Cueensboro
Bridge has done for Long Island, what the Philadelphia Bridge has
done for Camden, the Elizabeth Bridge will do for Washington Manor.
The latter refers to the new Goethals Bridge which was later con-
structed farther down the avenue, linking Elizabeth, N. J. to Old
Place, Staten Island.
March 3, 1927
P. L. Sperr
NO REIRODUCTIONS
